Comment: "BLM" = Bureau of Land Management, to be clear.  From the article:   "Wyoming’s Bureau of Land Management state director has been placed on administrative leave after a federal investigation found he violated ethics regulations.   Andrew Archuleta accepted a gift of dinner and drinks, misused his assistant’s time when he asked her to make travel arrangements for his girlfriend and drove his girlfriend to and from Buffalo in a government vehicle — all in violation of the Standards of Ethical Conduct for Employees of the Executive Branch, according to a February investigation summary from the Office of Inspector General."
Author: PansophicNostradamus

Comment: Actually on leave for ethics violations?  Must be a Democrat appointment.
